characterDescription.skinTone: Light olive skin with neutral undertones, slightly more rosy cheeks and around the nose
characterDescription.eyeColor: Bright sky blue eyes with a subtle darker blue limbal ring
characterDescription.eyeShape: Almond-shaped eyes, slightly downturned at outer corners, with average length eyelashes
characterDescription.hairColor: Medium ash brown with subtle auburn undertones, and natural lighter highlights in the crown of the head
characterDescription.hairTexture: Slightly wavy with natural volume, medium-thick strands
characterDescription.hairStyle: Often worn down past shoulders with face-framing layers, or styled in two high messy space buns
characterDescription.faceShape: Oval face with soft features, a moderately high forehead, and slight fullness in the cheeks
characterDescription.nose: Small, slightly upturned button nose with a rounded tip and subtly defined nostrils
characterDescription.lips: Naturally full lips, with the top lip slightly thinner than the bottom lip. A natural rose pink in color
characterDescription.smile: Wide open smile with a visible slight gap between the top front teeth
characterDescription.eyebrows: Medium-thick eyebrows, slightly arched, and a shade or two darker than her hair color
characterDescription.ears: Medium-sized ears that lie relatively close to the head
characterDescription.cheeks: Soft, moderately full cheeks with a natural flush of rosiness
characterDescription.chin: Slightly rounded chin, not particularly prominent
characterDescription.facialProportions: Balanced facial proportions, with the eyes positioned slightly wide-set relative to the nose width
characterDescription.distinctiveFeatures: A noticeable gap between the two upper front teeth. The bridge of the nose has faint freckling across it. The ears have attached earlobes.
characterDescription.overallImpression: Energetic and expressive appearance with a sweet and slightly mischievous look. She has classic, youthful features and a generally healthy complexion.
characterDescription.fullDescription: This child appears to be between 7 and 8 years old, with light olive skin and bright sky blue, almond-shaped eyes that are slightly downturned. Her medium ash brown hair, naturally wavy and voluminous, is often styled down or in space buns. She has a small, slightly upturned button nose and naturally full lips, revealing a slight gap between her top front teeth when she smiles widely. Her oval face shape is complemented by soft, rosy cheeks and medium-thick eyebrows, a shade or two darker than her hair. Her distinctive features include faint freckling across her nose bridge and attached earlobes.
